text: Answer: a, d Solution: (a) (0 + 11 + 101*01)* — regular expression of above DFA its cover all the path of DFA; True. (b) (0*1(01*0)*1)* — This expression not generate the string 110but DFA generate the string 110; false. (c) (0*1(01*0)*10*)* — DFA generate the string zero (0) but expression is not the string 0; false. (d) 0* (0*1(01*0)*10*)*0* — its cover all the path of DFA, this expression generate all the string generated by DFA. Answer: a, d
